Package ganymede.shell.magic

Class AbstractScriptEngineMagic

  • java.lang.Object
    • ganymede.shell.magic.AbstractMagic
      • ganymede.shell.magic.AbstractScriptEngineMagic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Magic, AnnotatedMagic, AnnotatedScriptEngineMagic
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FreeMarker, Groovy, Handlebars, Javascript, Kotlin, Scala, Thymeleaf, Velocity
    public abstract class AbstractScriptEngineMagic
extends AbstractMagic
implements AnnotatedScriptEngineMagic
    Abstract JSR 223 ScriptEngine Magic base class.

    Allen D. Ball

    • Method Detail

      • engine

        protected ScriptEngine engine()
        Method to get the ScriptEngine.
        Returns:
        The ScriptEngine if it can be instantiated; null otherwise.

      • initialize

        protected boolean initialize​(ScriptEngine engine)
        Method to initialize the ScriptEngine. Default implementation looks for a Class resource named with the Class.getSimpleName() and one of the ScriptEngine's extensions. A ScriptEngine instance that cannot be initialized will be ignored.
        Returns:
        true if the ScriptEngine can be initialized, false otherwise.

      • execute

        public void execute​(String line0,
                    String code)
             throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: Magic
        JShell execution method.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface Magic
        Parameters:
        line0 - The initial magic line.
        code - The remainder of the cell.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • execute

        protected void execute​(String[] argv,
                       String code)
                throws Exception
        Method provided for subclass implementations to intercept calculation of ScriptEngine.ARGV binding.
        Parameters:
        argv - The first line parsed as an array of Strings.
        code - The remainder of the cell.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • execute

        protected void execute​(String code)
        Target of execute(String,String). The argv is available in the ScriptContext ENGINE_SCOPE Bindings as ScriptEngine.ARGV.
        Parameters:
        code - The remainder of the cell.

      • render

        protected void render​(Object object)
        Callback to render the results of ScriptEngine.eval(String,ScriptContext). Made available for template engines. Default implementation does nothing.
        Parameters:
        object - The result of ScriptEngine.eval(String,ScriptContext).

      • show

        protected void show()
        Callback to show information about the ScriptEngine instance. Default implementation does nothing.
